title: Millie Bright / Angela Ruggiero / Sport at Tokyo 2020 starts
description: It's the first day of action at Tokyo 2020. We have a daily podcast of the best interviews, the most interesting news, and the most fun from the Olympics. The women's football kicks off with Team GB taking on Chile. We speak to Chelsea and Team GB defender Millie Bright about mental health and becoming and Olympian. Plus, what's it like to give out Olympic gold medals? Four-time Olympian Angela Ruggiero has received and given out medals. We get her perspective on that honour and her reasons why women's sport is unmissable. Let's go!!! #StrongerTogether
